DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the safety of the gynecological formulation in normal and usual usage condition of Dermacyd Femina Delicata.
DOC.criteria: Integral skin in the tested region Pregnancy or breastfeeding women Use of Antiinflammatory or immunesuppression drugs Topical medication use at the tested region Active cutaneous gynaecological disease which may interfere in study results Personal history of allergic disease at the area to be treated Allergic or atopic history The above information is not intended to contain considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
